mapper.insert: INSERT INTO place (pNo, pWriteTitle, pWriteSub, pType, pType_d, food, pickup,pPlaceTitle, pPlaceInfo,pHp, pS_Time, pE_Time, pAddress1,pAddress2, pBoxInfo,pCautionInfo,userId) VALUES (#{pNo},#{pWriteTitle},#{pWriteSub},#{pType},#{pType_d},#{food},#{pickup},#{pPlaceTitle},#{pPlaceInfo},#{pHp},#{pS_Time}, #{pE_Time}, #{pAddress1},#{pAddress2},#{pBoxInfo},#{pCautionInfo},#{userId})
